page.title: 19The Pantomime Cinderella'
page.content: I took part in the pantomime last year. I was in the childrens chorus. It all started in September when I went for an audition. I had to sing a song on the stage in front of several people. Then I had to go off stage and wait while other people did their auditions. I passed the audition and then I had to start going to weekly rehearsals. The rehearsals at the beginning are just once a week, as the actual performance gets closer they are three times a week for the children and every night for the adults. The pantomime is performed for 6 nights and one matinee. One of the last performances is videoed and later in the year, about March, all the cast have a fish and chip supper and watch the video. It is all great fun.
